posts.title: Bastei Luebbe : Lübbe AG announces unplanned write-down on intangible assets of its subsidiary oolipo AG | 4-Traders
posts.text:
DGAP-Ad-hoc: Bastei Lübbe AG / Key word(s): Miscellaneous
Bastei Lübbe AG announces unplanned write-down on intangible assets of its subsidiary oolipo AG 

07-Nov-2017 / 10:00 CET/CEST
Disclosure of an inside information acc. to Article 17 MAR, transmitted by DGAP - a service of EQS Group AG.
The issuer is solely responsible for the content of this announcement.

Ad hoc disclosure in accordance with section 17 MAR 
Bastei Lübbe AG announces unplanned write-down on intangible assets of its subsidiary oolipo AG 
Cologne, 7. November 2017. Bastei Lübbe AG undertakes an unplanned write-down on intangible assets of its subsidiary oolipo AG. The non-cash write-down will extraordinarily impact the EBIT in the second quarter of the current financial year in the amount of approximately EUR 3 million.
The streaming platform for reading content, developed with considerable financial efforts, has far from reached the expected and necessary user numbers. Over the next months, the Management Board will consider the possibility of differently using or exploiting the technology developed for this purpose.
07-Nov-2017 CET/CEST The DGAP Distribution Services include Regulatory Announcements, Financial/Corporate News and Press Releases. 
Archive at www.dgap.de

posts.author: 乐乐论金
posts.title: 11.7今日黄金、原油走势分析-
posts.text:
在近期市场空头气息愈发浓烈的时候，而多头已悄然蓄力待，本周美联储再次开始接管黄金市场。据消息显示，鲍威尔确认为美联储下任主席之，很可能延续耶伦当前的政策，对黄金而言是一大利好因素。另外债券市场正在向美联储发出警告！这也对当前黄金提供一定支撑。
黄金昨日受沙特反腐政局动荡影响避险情绪激发，如期探底1270先跌1266后一路震荡上行，美盘加速大涨1283回落1280震荡，我们昨日策略先空后多完美实现，昨日涨势强劲上行突破多空转化位小颈线压力。
就在刚刚随着美联储主席杜德利讲话时，现货黄金突破1280美元关口，目前受到上方1282一线阻力压制，从4小时线来看，强势的多头目前受到上方阻力1282一线的压制回调至1280附近，附图指标MACD出现金叉，多头的强势暂时得不到缓解，周一上午本人给出的多单目标点位1275-77也是成功获利出局，综合目前的行情走势分析，操作上乐乐建议强势的多头谨慎追空。
黄金操作建议：
1、建议不破上方1282-85附近做空，止损4美金，目标1278-1276附近；
2、建议不破下方1276-78附近做多，止损4美金，目标1282附近；
原油技术面分析：
日线K线已经触及布林带上轨。短周期均线金叉放量，MACD指标金叉放量，STO超买继续向上，日线指标非常强势；四小时随着价格的不断拉升，K线游离布林带上轨之外。短周期金叉放量，MACD指标金叉放量，STO超买有下行趋势。综合盘面指标来看，多头强势无疑。上方基本上看不到太多可以参考的压力位，但预计短期连续破高的几率不会太大。建议日内关注上方58一线压制，短线继续维持看涨思路不变。
原油操作建议：
1、建议不破56.8附近做多，止损0.4美金，目标57.5附近；
乐乐寄语：
趋势来时，应之，随之。无趋势时，观之，静之。等待趋势最终明朗后，再动手也不迟。这样会失去少量的机会，但却赢得了资金的安全。投资理财需要的是一个长期稳定的盈利过程，追求一夜暴富，最后只会血本无归。你可以选择继续观望，但你的生活依然不会有任何改变。一念非凡还是一念人间，选择在你。
温馨提示：天气转凉大家注意备件外套，身体才是革命的本钱，要好好爱自己！

thread.title: Αίγυπτος: Πολεμική για την «ανακάλυψη» του μεγάλου κενού στην Πυραμίδα του Χέοπα
thread.title_full: Αίγυπτος: Πολεμική για την «ανακάλυψη» του μεγάλου κενού στην Πυραμίδα του Χέοπα

posts.author: Georgios Koylis (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Αίγυπτος: Πολεμική για την «ανακάλυψη» του μεγάλου κενού στην Πυραμίδα του Χέοπα
posts.text:
Ο αιγύπτιος αρχαιολόγος Ζαχί Χάουας που εποπτεύει το διεθνές πρόγραμμα της μελέτης του εσωτερικού των Πυραμίδων επέκρινε σήμερα την ανακοίνωση που έγινε αυτήν την εβδομάδα για την ύπαρξη ενός τεράστιου κενού στο εσωτερικό της Πυραμίδας του Χέοπα, λέγοντας ότι δεν πρόκειται για «ανακάλυψη», διότι αυτό το κενό ήταν ήδη γνωστό.

Επιστήμονες του προγράμματος ScanPyramids αποκάλυψαν τη Πέμπτη σε μελέτη τους την παρουσία ενός κενού «μεγάλου όσο ένα αεροπλάνο 200 θέσεων στην καρδιά της Πυραμίδας του Χέοπα», γνωστής και ως Μεγάλης Πυραμίδας, ενός μνημείου ύψους 139 μέτρων και πλάτους 230 μέτρων στην κοιλάδα της Γκίζας, στα περίχωρα του Καΐρου.

Ο αιγύπτιος αρχαιολόγος δήλωσε στο Γαλλικό Πρακτορείο (AFP) ότι συναντήθηκε εδώ και δύο μήνες στο Κάιρο με τους υπεύθυνους, οι οποίοι τον ενημέρωσαν τότε για τα συμπεράσματά τους. «Τους πληροφορήσαμε τότε ότι δεν πρόκειται για ανακάλυψη».

«Η Πυραμίδα είναι γεμάτη κενά, αλλά αυτό δεν σημαίνει ότι αυτά τα κενά φιλοξενούν μυστικά δωμάτια ή ότι πρόκειται για νέα ανακάλυψη», διαβεβαιώνει ο Ζαχί Χάουας , επικεφαλής της επιστημονικής επιτροπής που εποπτεύει το πρόγραμμα ScanPyramids.

Κατά τη γνώμη δε του γενικού γραμματέα της κυβερνητικής επιτροπής αρχαιοτήτων Μούσταφα Ουαζίρι, «η επιστημονική επιτροπή δεν έπρεπε να βιαστεί ... χρησιμοποιώντας αβανταδόρικους χαρακτηρισμούς όπως "ανακάλυψη" ή "κενό μεγέθους αεροπλάνου"».

«Η δουλειά πρέπει να συνεχιστεί ακολουθώντας τα στάδια της επιστημονικής έρευνας και πρέπει να συζητείται πριν από κάθε δημοσίευση», δηλώνει σε ανακοίνωση που εκδόθηκε σήμερα.

Ο Κουνίχιρο Μορισίμα, του ιαπωνικού πανεπιστημίου της Ναγκόγια και εκ των συγγραφέων της μελέτης του ScanPyramids που δημοσιεύθηκε στο περιοδικό Nature, ανακοίνωσε ότι «το κενό δεν ήταν γνωστό σε κανέναν μέχρι σήμερα, από την κατασκευή της Πυραμίδας εδώ και 4.500 χρόνια».

Ονομάστηκε «το μεγάλο κενό» από ορισμένους ερευνητές, έχει μήκος 30 μέτρα και χαρακτηριστικά παρόμοια με τη μεγάλη γαλαρία, την μεγαλύτερη γνωστή αίθουσα της Πυραμίδας του Χέοπα.

Πηγή

thread.title: Simon Cowell breaks silence on sex abuse scandal: 'I was put in situations when I was younger'
thread.title_full: Simon Cowell breaks silence on sex abuse scandal: 'I was put in situations when I was younger'

posts.author: Emma Powell
posts.title: Simon Cowell breaks silence on sex abuse scandal: 'I was put in situations when I was younger'
posts.text:
Simon Cowell breaks silence on sex abuse scandal: 'I was put in situations when I was younger' 
The X Factor judge said the entertainment industry is not a nice business Tuesday 7 November 2017 09:52 Click to followES Entertainment Speaking out: X Factor judge Simon Cowell Ian West/PA 
Simon Cowell has broken his silence on the ongoing Hollywood sex abuse scandal, claiming he was “put in situations” when he was younger. 
The music mogul, 58, weighed in on the crisis in the wake of allegations of sexual misconduct levelled against Harvey Weinstein, Kevin Spacey, James Toback and Jeremy Piven. 
Cowell said the entertainment industry is not a nice business and that he hopes those involved will get what they deserve. 
Speaking at the Music Industry Trusts Award he told The Sun: “Look, I have grown up in the music business. Disgraced: Producer Harvey Weinstein with his CBE in 2004 (PA) 
“Even as a kid I was put in situations when I was first working you know, it’s not a very nice business.” 
He continued: “I do [think there will be change] actually to be honest with you. People get what they deserve. That’s all I’m going to say.” Society to burn Harvey Weinstein effigy at Bonfire Night event 
Cowell’s comments came as Weinstein was expelled for life from the Television Academy because of “widespread examples of this horrific behaviour.” 
The disgraced producer has been accused of harassment, assault and rape by scores of high profile actresses including Gwyneth Paltrow, Angelina Jolie and Rose McGowan. He has denied any claims of non-consensual sex. Read more

thread.section_title: Noticias de la Ciencia y la Tecnología (Amazings®  / NCYT®)
thread.title: Una investigación del Campus de Palencia revela que el pan candeal tiene mejores propiedades para la digestión
thread.title_full: Una investigación del Campus de Palencia revela que el pan candeal tiene mejores propiedades para la digestión

posts.title: Una investigación del Campus de Palencia revela que el pan candeal tiene mejores propiedades para la digestión
posts.text:
De miga más compacta, el pan candeal ha perdido protagonismo en los hogares en las últimas décadas en favor de otras variedades de este alimento básico. Un grupo de investigación de la Universidad de Valladolid en el campus de la Yutera, Palencia (España), ha comparado este producto típico de Castilla con otras variedades comerciales, como la barra y la chapata, y ha observado que la digestión del almidón, el compuesto mayoritario en la harina, es más prolongada en la corteza de este pan clásico. 

“La velocidad de la digestibilidad del almidón es clave, ya que permite que la liberación de energía sea más extendida", explica el catedrático del Área de Tecnología de los Alimentos en la Escuela Técnica Superior de Palencia Manuel Gómez Pallarés. El almidón es aproximadamente el 80 por ciento de la harina de trigo. Básicamente, el pan es un alimento compuesto por dos ingredientes, harina y agua, con sal y levadura que actúan de ligazones. En la digestión, el almidón es degradado por enzimas liberando glucosas. Según sea de rápida la degradación de este almidón, el incremento de la glucosa en la sangre será más o menos rápido. 

“Según su comportamiento en esta degradación, se puede considerar que existen tres tipos de almidones, de rápida digestión, de lenta digestión y resistente", explica Laura Román, investigadora del área de Tecnología de los Alimentos. “El de lenta digestión está asociado con una baja respuesta glicémica y con el control y la prevención de enfermedades relacionadas con la hiperglucemia, como la diabetes o las enfermedades vasculares", añade. No en vano, existen ya productos en el mercado, como galletas, que se promocionan con el argumento de que su aporte energético dura más tiempo que su competencia. 

Laura Román analiza una muestra de chapata en el laboratorio. (Foto: UVa) 

En un estudio publicado en la revista Food Chemistry, se analizaron tres tipos de pan (candeal, barra y chapata) según el porcentaje de agua empleado en la producción del pan. El pan candeal emplea un 45% de agua en su base de harina, en la barra alcanza el 60% y en la chapata llega al 75%. Esto es observable en su corte: después de cocer, la miga del candeal es más compacta, mientras que en la chapata se ven más huecos. En la corteza, en todos los casos, en el horneado se evapora más rápidamente el agua, lo que reduce su presencia en el producto final y el mantenimiento de la estructura del almidón menos accesible a las enzimas digestivas. 

A partir de una simulación en laboratorio de la digestión humana, el equipo investigador analizó características tanto de la corteza como de la miga de los tres tipos de pan. El tipo de almidón rápidamente digerible era el más habitual en todo caso, tanto en la parte externa como interna de los panes. Sin embargo, el almidón de lenta digestión tenía una presencia mayor de forma significativa en el pan candeal, por el menor aporte de agua en su amasado y por esa estructura más cerrada. 

El modelo de digestibilidad fue desarrollado en la Universidad Purdue (West Lafayette, Estados Unidos) por Mario Martínez, doctor por la Universidad de Valladolid. Este trabajo es el primero que se realiza tanto de la digestibilidad del almidón en la corteza y la miga por separado como el efecto del aporte del agua en la fórmula de la masa. Los autores son cautos a la hora de extraer conclusiones para el consumidor. “Faltan estudios en personas que confirmen las conclusiones a las que hemos llegado", señalan. 

En el caso de las cortezas, la degradación del almidón se realiza más prolongadamente que en la miga en los tres tipos proporcionando una energía más extendida. 

Por ello, el estudio permite poner en valor un producto que ha visto reducida su presencia en panaderías y tahonas. Otrora alimento esencial en el ámbito rural, el pan candeal ha ido perdiendo presencia por un menor interés comercial tanto por parte del consumidor, como del panadero. “De paso, rompemos el mito de que la corteza engorda más que la miga, ya que no es así, al contrario, sacia más", concluye Gómez Pallarés. El consumo de pan en España se sitúa en torno a los 170 gramos por persona en la actualidad y se ha reducido en las últimas décadas por el cambio de hábitos alimentarios y de vida. 

El grupo de investigación ha sido galardonado recientemente en el congreso de la American Association of Cereal Chemistry, en San Diego (Estados Unidos). La investigadora Laura Román recibió en octubre el premio en una de las categorías por sus trabajos en torno a harinas extrusionadas. (Fuente: UVA/DICYT) Quizá también puedan interesarle estos enlaces...

thread.title: Immobilienkonzern Alstria Office federt sinkende Umsätze ab - Finanznachrichten auf Cash.Online
thread.title_full: Immobilienkonzern Alstria Office federt sinkende Umsätze ab - Finanznachrichten auf Cash.Online

posts.author: Finevision Und Media Lotse Fuer Cash.Online Http
posts.title: Immobilienkonzern Alstria Office federt sinkende Umsätze ab - Finanznachrichten auf Cash.Online
posts.text:
Immobilien Immobilienkonzern Alstria Office federt sinkende Umsätze ab 
Der Immobilienkonzern Alstria Office hat trotz rückläufiger Umsätze sein operatives Ergebnis dank Einsparungen fast stabil gehalten. Das Unternehmen baut sein Portfolio derzeit um. Alstria Office will sich künftig auf Büroimmobilien fokussieren (Symbolfoto). 
In den ersten neuen Monaten sanken die Mietumsätze um 7,5 Prozent auf 143,8 Millionen Euro, wie der Konzern am Montag mitteilte. Der Rückgang resultiere aus dem Verkauf von Immobilien im Vergleich zum Vorjahr. 
Alstria ordnet sein Portfolios schon länger neu und trennt sich von sogenannten nichtstrategischen Immobilien. Das Unternehmen will sich weiter auf Büroimmobilien in den großen deutschen Bürozentren konzentrieren. 
Gewinn durch Objektverkauf 
Das operative Ergebnis (FFO) nach Minderheitsanteilen erreichte im Zeitraum Januar bis September 85,9 Millionen Euro (Vorjahr 87,0 Millionen Euro). Die Marge konnte Alstria dank gesunkener Finanzierungsaufwendungen und niedrigerer Verwaltungs- und Personalkosten deutlich steigern. 
Ein Bewertungsgewinn im Zusammenhang mit dem Verkauf der Kaisergalerie in Hamburg habe das Nettoergebnis unterdessen gegenüber dem Vorjahreszeitraum um 43 Prozent auf 111,7 Millionen Euro steigen lassen. 
Die im Sommer erhöhte Prognose bestätigte das im M-Dax notierte Unternehmen. (dpa-AFX)

posts.title: راعي كنيسة العذراء بكندا: مشكلة مصر عدم التسويق الجيد (فيديو)
posts.text: ندى محمد أكد القس ماركوس عبدالمسيح، راعي كنيسة العذراء مريم بكندا، أن تنظيم منتدى شباب العالم فاق كل التوقعات وأنه كان منبهرا بكل شئ من تنظيم وتطبيق وقيام الشباب بأغلب التحركات، متابعا أن المصريين في الخارج لديهم رغب في خدمة بلدهم وأول خطوة فيها هو فتح الباب امام الشباب عبر المنتدى. وأضاف في حوار ببرنامج "صباح اون" على فضائية "أون لايف"، اليوم الثلاثاء، أن هناك دورا على الشباب المصري لنقل الحضارة المصري إلى الخارج مما يساهم في التسويق لدولتنا، متابعا أن مشكلة مصر هو عدم وجود التسويق الجيد وبالتالي لا نصل إلى كثير من شعوب العالم.

thread.title: Kādu – India’s first ‘Wine for a Cause’
thread.title_full: Kādu – India’s first ‘Wine for a Cause’

posts.author: mediatech9140
posts.title: Kādu – India’s first ‘Wine for a Cause’
posts.text:
Launch of the first premium wine offering from Sula’s Karnataka vineyards that will contribute towards tiger conservation 
Bangalore, November 6 th , 2017: Kādu, (pronounced Kaa-du) is the first premium wine offering from the Sula’s Karnataka vineyards, India’s leading wine producer.
Cecilia Oldne & Narendra Kumar

Kādu, meaning “wild” in Kannada – the regional language of Karnataka – is India’s first “Wine for a Cause”. The beautiful label, handiwork of renowned label designer Simon Frouws, depicts a tiger in all its glory in the wild jungle.
Karnataka is home to the most wild tigers on the planet in its many reserves. But the majestic beast – India’s national animal – is endangered, with its habitat under threat.
Sula has decided to take up the cause of the magnificent tiger with Kādu. With each bottle sold, Kādu will contribute towards tiger conservation in Karnataka. To ensure the optimum end-use of the funds contributed, Sula is collaborating with Mud on Boots, the pioneering initiative by the Sanctuary Nature Foundation that is designed to empower and support grassroots conservationists across India
 
Kādu was launched by Rajeev Samant, Founder and CEO, Sula Vineyards Bengaluru on 6 th November. In a bid to mark the grand occasion, Rajeev presented the first Kādu cheque to Sanctuary Nature Foundation. Their Mud on Boots project leader Nagaraj will spearhead the project.
 
Speaking of the launch, Rajeev Samant, Founder and CEO, Sula Vineyards, stated , “The Kādu wines are the most significant launch for Sula in the past 10 years. Kādu is our first wholly ‘Made in Karnataka’ wine and we thought it was also the perfect occasion to give something back to a cause we hold very dear – that of wildlife conservation. It made total sense to choose the tiger as the focus of Kādu and it’s our way of giving a little something back one sip and one glass at a time. Kādu is Sula’s homage to Karnataka as one of India’s most important wine regions and is the fruit of Sula’s efforts to bring the best from Karnataka’s terroir to your glass.” 
Rajeev Samant & Cecilia Oldne
Bittu Sahgal, Founder, Sanctuary Nature Foundation, speaking on the association with Kādu, said, “ Through the Mud on Boots project, Sanctuary is empowering a network of grassroots conservationists across the country who are doing critical but unsung work. With Sula’s support this network now extends to Bhadra landscape of Karnataka where Project Leader Nagaraj is spearheading diverse conservation efforts through collaborations with the forest department, NGOs and local communities.” 
Winemaker Gorakh Gaikwad has crafted Kādu from the choicest premium Karnataka wine grapes to produce this wonderful “wine for a cause”! Kādu comes in 4 different wine varietals – Kādu Chenin Blanc, Kādu Sauvignon Blanc, Kādu Shiraz Rosé and Kādu Cabernet Shiraz.
Excited about the launch, Gorakh Gaikwad, Head Winemaker, Kādu said , “Karnataka has a perfect climate for growing a wide variety of international grapes. It has taken the viticulture and winemaking teams a lot of efforts and hard work to get to this! I am really looking forward to the Kannadigas tasting our very first vintage wines Kādu and us raising a toast for a good cause!” 
Four delicious Kādu wines in both 750 ml and 375 ml are available in Karnataka.
Kādu Chenin Blanc – delicious, slightly sweet, floral and fruity. 750ml: ₹ 625 | 375ml: ₹ 340 Kādu Sauvignon Blanc – delicate aromas and flavours of passion fruit, cut grass and green peppers. 750ml: ₹ 675 | 375ml: ₹ 365 Kādu Shiraz Rose – light, fruity and full of luscious berry flavours. 750ml: ₹ 650 | 375ml: ₹ 350 Kādu Cabernet Shiraz – lush, medium bodied and peppery with subtle oak. | 750ml: ₹ 695 | 375ml: ₹375 Come help Save the Tiger, one sip at a time!
——————–
To learn more and further contribute;
Website www.kadu.co.in 
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/KaduIndia/ 
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/kaduindia/ 
Twitter https://twitter.com/kaduindia 
About Sula Vineyards 
Sula Vineyards is by far India’s first choice in wine. Their award-winning wines are available nationwide at the finest hotels and restaurants, and are also exported throughout the world. Sula is on track to sell a million cases of wine in 2018.
Sula is also a pioneer in India’s wine tourism opening the country’s first winery Tasting Room in 2005 and first vineyard resort, Beyond by Sula, in 2007. In March 2017, the company opened India’s first heritage winery resort, The Source at Sula. Their annual music festival SulaFest taking place yearly in the first weekend of February is one of the country’s most awaited festivals.
With over 250,000 visitors last year, Sula is one of the most visited wineries in the world and the #1 spot where Indians first taste wine.
Sula Vineyards recently won the prestigious Drinks Business Award 2016 for the ‘Best Contribution to Wine and Spirits Tourism’! This is the first time an Indian company has won a Drinks Business Award.
Firmly committed to remaining at the forefront of Indian wines, Sula continues to experiment with new varietals, engage in sustainable agriculture and support the local rural economy. Sula is well on its way to becoming one of the world’s most sustainable wine producers.
In addition, the company is also a leading wine and spirits importer, with Sula Selections, a portfolio of prestigious brands like Remy Cointreau, Hardys, Cono Sur and Asahi.
For information on the entire Sula brand portfolio, visit www.sulavineyards.com

The Klein Law Firm Notifies Investors of an Investigation Concerning Possible Violations of Federal Securities Laws by J.Jill, Inc.
The Klein Law Firm announces the commencement of an investigation of J.Jill, Inc. (NYSE:JILL) concerning possible violations of federal securities laws.
On March 9, 2017, the Company sold 11,666,667 common stock shares at a price of $13 per share for gross proceeds of over $150 million. On October 11, 2017, J.Jill announced lowered guidance for the third quarter ending October 28, 2017, citing “a lower than expected sales trend…” Following this news, shares of J.Jill common stock fell to a close of $4.86 per share on October 12, 2017.
If you suffered a loss in J.Jill and wish to obtain additional information, please contact Joseph Klein, Esq. by telephone at 212-616-4899 or visit http://www.kkclasslaw.com/JILL-Info-Request-Form-222 .

posts.author: 홍종윤 기자
posts.title: 세종시, 행정·민원제도 개선 '장관상'
posts.text:
카카오스토리 
[중부매일 홍종윤 기자] 세종시는 행정안전부가 주관한 '2017년 국민생활밀접 행정·민원제도 개선 우수사례 경진대회'에서 전국 지자체 중 유일하게 행정 및 민원 분야 모두 장관상에 입상했다고 7일 밝혔다. 중앙부처와 지방자치단체 등의 참여로 제도개선 우수사례를 발굴하고, 성과를 공유하기 위해 마련된 이번 대회는 총 196건의 사례 중 서면심사와 전문가심사를 거쳐 34건의 우수사례가 선정됐다. 세종시는 이번 대회에 행정분야 우수사례로 '세종시 복지자원 빅데이터 구축'을, 민원제도 우수사례로'자동차 온라인 등록제'를 각각 신청했다. 복지지원 빅데이터 구축은 기부자와 복지수혜자 간 시스템 매칭을 통해 복지자원의 중복, 편중, 누락을 미연에 방지할 수 있는 제도이며, 자동차 온라인 등록제는 자동차등록사무를 등록관청을 방문하지 않고 온라인으로 처리할 수 있는 서비스이다. 이한유 민원과장은"시민이 체감하는 불편민원 제도를 발굴, 개선하여 모두가 만족하는 행정서비스 제공에 더욱 노력하겠다"고 말했다. 홍종윤 기자 jyhong@jbnews.com

thread.title: Man Who Exchanged Fire With Texas Shooter: 'I Was Scared To Death'
thread.title_full: Man Who Exchanged Fire With Texas Shooter: 'I Was Scared To Death'

posts.author: Scott Neuman
posts.title: Man Who Exchanged Fire With Texas Shooter: 'I Was Scared To Death'
posts.text:
By Scott Neuman • 8 hours ago Stephen Willeford, right and Johnnie Langendorff, left, attend a vigil for the victims of the First Baptist Church shooting on Monday, in Sutherland Springs, Texas. Willeford shot suspect Devin Patrick Kelley, and Langendorff drove the truck while chasing Kelley. David J. Phillip / AP Originally published on November 7, 2017 2:27 am 
The Sutherland Springs, Texas, resident who exchanged gunfire with the suspect in Sunday's mass shooting at a church insists he is not a hero, saying the he was "scared to death" during the encounter. 
"I think my God, my Lord protected me and gave me the skills to do what needed to be done," Stephen Willeford, a former National Rifle Association instructor, tells KHBS/KHOG television in Arkansas. 
Willeford says his daughter alerted him to what sounded like shots being fired at the nearby First Baptist Church. That's when he said he got his rifle out of his safe. 
"I kept hearing the shots, one after another, very rapid shots — just 'pop pop pop pop' and I knew every one of those shots represented someone, that it was aimed at someone, that they weren't just random shots," Willeford said. 
"I was scared to death, I was," a visibly shaken Willeford told the television station. "I was scared for me. I was scared for every one of them and I was scared for my own family that lived less than a block away." 
Willeford said he loaded a magazine in his rifle and ran across the street without even taking the time to put on his shoes. 
When he saw the suspect, identified by police as Devin Patrick Kelley, the two exchanged gunfire. 
"He saw me and I saw him," Willeford said. "I was standing behind a pickup truck for cover." 
"I know I hit him," Willeford said. "He got into his vehicle, and he fired another couple rounds through his side window. When the window dropped, I fired another round at him again." 
Kelley was reportedly wearing tactical gear and wielding a variant of the AR-15 assault rifle. 
When the gunman sped away, Willeford saw a pickup truck and quickly explained the situation to the driver, later identified as Johnnie Langendorff, and the two set off on a high-speed chase to run down the attacker. 
Langendorff told KSAT that Willeford "came to my vehicle in distress with his weapon" and said "'we need to pursue him. He just shot up the church.' " 
Langendorff said he and the other man pursued the shooter at high speed before he appeared to lose control and go off the road. "The other gentleman jumped out and had his rifle on him and he didn't move after that," Langendorff told the TV station. 
Kelley's vehicle, a truck, hit a road sign and flip before landing in a ditch, KHBS/KHOG says. Willeford says he put his rifle on the top of the truck and yelled to the suspect "get out of the truck, get out of the truck," but never saw any movement until law enforcement arrived a few minutes later. 
Freeman Martin, regional director of the state's Department of Public Safety, said the cause of Kelley's death had not been determined. "However, investigators found evidence at the scene that indicates the subject may have died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound." Copyright 2017 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/. thread.title_full: Spacciava droga in casa sotto gli occhi dei figli piccoli

posts.author: Dario Moio
posts.title: Spacciava droga in casa sotto gli occhi dei figli piccoli
posts.text:
Spacciava droga in casa sotto gli occhi dei figli piccoli Spacciava droga in casa sotto gli occhi dei figli piccoli 
I bambini guardavano la tv mentre il padre vendeva cocaina ed eroina ai clienti: blitz della polizia smonta centrale dello spaccio By Dario Moio - 7 novembre 2017 
CAIVANO – Sono trascorsi solo quattro giorni, da quando gli agenti del Commissariato di P.S. “Afragola” hanno eseguito un sequestro di circa 15kg di cocaina ed eroina, destinata a quella che è considerata una delle più grandi “piazze di spaccio” a nord di Napoli, che ha portato all’arresto di due persone e, nella serata di ieri, i poliziotti hanno fatto nuovamente irruzione nel Parco Verde di Caivano (NA), arrestando un ennesimo spacciatore. 
G. B. , pregiudicato di 48anni, sottoposto al regime degli arresti domiciliari, proprio per essere stato arrestato per il reato di stupefacenti, aveva installato presso la sua abitazione un circuito di videosorveglianza, in modo da osservare il perimetro dello stabile, oltre all’area parcheggio. 
I poliziotti , avendo osservato il modus operandi dello spacciatore, abitante al piano rialzato, hanno fatto irruzione nell’abitazione nell’attimo in cui ne stava uscendo uno dei tanti acquirenti. La sorpresa degli agenti, nell’entrare in casa, è stata quella di sorprendere, nel salone-soggiorno, tre bambini, di età compresa tra i 10 ed i 13 anni, che guardavano la tv mentre era in atto l’attività di spaccio, mentre da un’altra smart tv, ubicata nello stesso ambiente, venivano trasmesse le immagini del sistema di videosorveglianza. 
Inutile il tentativo del 48enne, alla vista dei poliziotti, di disfarsi di un involucro, contenente droga, cercando di lanciarlo dalla finestra dell’appartamento, prontamente, strappatogli dalle mani da un poliziotto. Sulla penisola della zona cucina, rinvenuto un bilancino di precisione, numerosissime banconote di vario taglio, per la somma di €.1.400,00, un rotolo di buste per il confezionamento, un accendino ed un paio di forbici. 
Identificato e segnalato alla competente Autorità l’acquirente, trovato in possesso di una dose di “cocaina”, acquistata per la somma di €.20,00. La droga sequestrata allo spacciatore, dalla quale era possibile confezionare almeno 50 dosi, è risultata essere identica a quella sequestrata all’acquirente. L’uomo è stato arrestato, in quanto responsabile del reato di spaccio e di detenzione ai fini di spaccio di sostanza stupefacente, e condotto dalla Polizia alla Casa Circondariale di Poggioreale.

thread.title_full: BTU Commences Ground Program Aimed at Defining Drill Targets at Galway, Ireland

posts.author: www.4-traders.com
posts.title: BTU Commences Ground Program Aimed at Defining Drill Targets at Galway, Ireland
posts.text:
Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - November 7, 2017) - BTU Metals Corp. (TSXV: BTU) ("BTU" or the "Company") reports it has commenced work at its Galway Gold property located in County Galway, Republic of Ireland. 
The company is targeting orogenic and low-sulphidation mineralization based on the following factors:
Location within the Caledonian (Lower Paleozoic) orogenic zone.
Favourable lithologies for metal precipitation (chemical traps) within the Dalradian Supergroup metasediments, e.g., graphitic schist, marble.
Favourable source rocks for gold, e.g., arc volcanics and numerous cross-cutting faults, evidence for post-collision rifting and volcanism in the Silurian/Devonian in Ireland and neighbouring terranes. 
Known gold occurrences related to late cross-cutting fault structures, some of which shows textural evidence for near-surface boiling that affects precipitation of metals from solution, e.g., Bohaun Gold occurrence. 
About the Lee Occurrence 
The Lee occurrence lies within Prospecting Licence 2295 and is located 10km west of the Bohaun epithermal gold occurrence. A series of mineralized boulders were discovered by Ovoca Gold Exploration in the late 1980s. These boulders returned values of up to 195 g/t Au and 240 g/t Ag. Deep overburden sampling outlined a 1km long, NW trending lead-zinc-arsenic-silver-gold anomaly. Subsequent trenching located a tectonic breccia containing sulphides and gold values up to 12 g/t. The mineralized breccia is associated with a lamprophyre dyke intruded along a pre-existing shear zone (Ovoca Gold Exploration PLC, 1988). 
Additionally, Ovoca identified a second separate hydrothermal system on PL2295. In this system, gold values are associated with quartz porphyry intrusions in Dalradian rocks. Outcrop sampling of an exposed fault system yielded gold values between 3 and 5 g/t Au. Float samples of comparable material assayed up to 24.5 g/t Au (Ovoca Gold Exploration PLC, 1987). 
About the Dooros Occurrence 
The Dooros occurrence lies within Prospecting Licence 3145 and gold is reported from massive pyrrhotite mineralization hosted in an amphibolite unit. An historical sample taken from this area assayed by Anglo United Development Ltd. returned 1.3 g/t Au. Ennex reported the discovery of a 3000' (914.4 meter) long zone containing anomalous gold values. Trenching has identified seven bedrock copper-gold occurrences, with the best historical showing having a strike length of 120' (36.6 meters) averaging 1.1% copper and 0.2 ounces (6.86 g/t) gold per short ton. Historical trench samples include:
1.7 metres of 11.2 g/t Au 1.2 metres of 7.12 g/t Au 2.7 metres of 12.6 g/t Au 4.2 metres of 6.2 g/t Au (Source - Irish Base Metals / Aquatine Mining Data). 
Five of the occurrences were tested by drilling and all holes intersected mineralization including 15.0 feet of 0.17 ounces gold per short ton (Aurum Mineral Resources Limited 2009, Exploration Work Report PL3145). 
The 2017 work program will consist of mapping, sampling, and geophysics to follow up on this and other historic work as well as more recent work performed by BTU which garnered samples assaying up to 49.6 g/t Au (see PR dated July 27, 2017) from the Lee showing. A diamond drill program is expected to follow. 
Andris Kikauka , P. Geo, is a qualified person as defined by National Instrument 43-101 and is responsible for reviewing and approving the technical contents of this press release.

thread.title: Devin Booker, cuarto jugador más joven en alcanzar los 3.000 puntos.
thread.title_full: Devin Booker, cuarto jugador más joven en alcanzar los 3.000 puntos.

posts.author: Torre Deportiva (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Devin Booker, cuarto jugador más joven en alcanzar los 3.000 puntos.
posts.text:
Devin Booker, 21 años cumplidos el 30 de octubre, es el cuarto jugador más joven en la historia de la NBA que alcanza los 3.000 puntos. Necesitaba sólo 6 tantos en su duelo ante los Nets para llegar a esa barrera. Antes de la derrota de anoche contra Brooklyn (92-98). Booker sumaba 2.994 puntos en sus dos temporadas, y unas semanas de la tercera, que lleva en activo.

El escolta de Phoenix, quien en la 2016-17 firmó 70 puntos ante los Celtics, se fue hasta los 18 contra los Nets, por lo que su cifra anotadora se fija en 3.012 tantos en 165 encuentros, lo que arroja una media de 18,2 por velada.

Sólo algunos elegidos están por delante de Booker en este selecto club de adelantados a su tiempo. LeBron James, Kevin Durant y Carmelo Anthony son los únicos jugadores de toda la liga que llegaron antes que Booker a esos 3.000 puntos.

James, líder de la clasificación, lo logró a los 20 años y 62 días, entre 2003 y 2005; Durant, tocó los 3.000 tantos a los 20 años y 144 días, mientras que Melo lo hizo a los 20 años y 307 días. Ahora Booker lo logra a los 21 años y 7 días. El Top-5 lo cierra Andrew Wiggins, que llegó a los 3.000 créditos anotadores con 21 años y 44 días.

요즘엔 자연스러운 아이브로우가 대세잖아요
3D엠보눈썹 / 자연눈썹이라고 해서 굉장히 많이 하잖아요.
저는 몇 년 전에 엄마는 20년전에 눈썹문신을 받으셨는데
그~ 특유의 푸른빛 도는 색상으로 색이 많이 빠지셔서 고민을 하시길래 반영구 잘하는 곳을 찾아봤어요.
엄마 기준에서 (리터치를 받으러 가야 하니까~)너무 멀지 않은 곳!
자연스러운 아이브로우를 만들어 주는 곳! 을 검색을 해봤는데
가까운 수유역 근처에 핑크브로우 로 예약을 잡았어요.

8층 819호 핑크브로우
010-8004-7290

8층 엘리베이터에 내리면 핑크브로우 POP가 있어요.
반영구화장뿐만 아니라 왁싱 / 속눈썹까지~
예뻐지는 공간이에요.
819호 핑크브로우로 들어가면~
굉장히 깔끔하고 넓어요.
베드도 3개나 돼요~
예약 시간만 잘 맞춰가면 기다림 없이 바로 받을 수 있어요.
바로 앞 타임 손님이 조금 늦게 오는 바람에 살짝 기다렸지만~~
대기하는 공간도 넓어서~ 편하게 티비 보면서 기다렸답니다.
핑크브로우에선 속눈썹 / 왁싱 / 반영구를 할 수 있어요.
속눈썹 파마도 궁금해서 여쭤보니 다음 달부터 다시 하신다고 하셔요~~
전 다음 달 엄마 리터치 받으러 가실 때 속눈썹 파마해야겠어요 ㅎㅎㅎ
엄마가~ 아이브로우 라인을 잡고 있을때~ 저는 핑크브로우를 둘러봤어요.
요샌 어딜가나 가격 안내가 되어 있어서 보기 편해요.
현금결제 시 15% DC
카톡 친구 추가 만원할인
속눈썹 3만원
헤어라인 행사
일요일 예약 가능 하다고 해요~
일요일 예약 가능이라니!!!! 시간없으신 분들도 딱!
저도 다음에 카톡 친구 추가해서 할인받아야겠어요
Pinkbrow
테이블에 간식도 있고~~~ 저는 편하게 티비보면서~ 기다렸답니다.
친구와 같이 와도 편안하게 기다릴 공간이 있어서 좋을것 같아요.
한쪽에는 각종 경연 대회에서 상을 받으신 상장도 있고~
파우더룸도 예쁘게~ 준비되어 있어요.
가볍게 머리 정리도~ 할 수 있어서 좋아요~
자연눈썹문신할 때 염료가 중요하잖아요.
염료에 관한 시험성적서와 검사 성적서도 볼 수 있어서 믿고 받을 수 있어요.
일회용도구를 사용해서
염증이나 세균감염 걱정 없어요~~
 개봉전 눈으로 확인시켜 주시셔서 엄마와 함께~ 봤어요 ㅎㅎ
수유자연눈썹은 굉장히 간단하게 진행돼요~
언니가 손이 빠르셔서 그런지~쓱쓱~~~ 금방 끝난 것 같은 기분이 들어요.
비포 사진!!!!
너무 옛날에 한 아이브로우라 흐릿하면서 조금 얇아요~
엄마 눈썹디자인이 옛날디자인이지만 라인은 예뻐서 요즘스타일 모양으로 받기로 했어요.
일회용 장갑을 착용하시고~ 바로 눈썹 디자인을 해주셔요.
생각보다 두껍게 그려진 것 같아서 걱정했는데
걱정할 거 하나도 없었어요.
선생님이 해주시는 데로만~~ 한다면 정말 예쁘게 나올 거예요
가이드를 그리고~ 마취크림을 마르고 25분 정도~ 기다립니다.
사실 마취크림 바르고 기다리는 게 제일 시간이 많이 소요되는 것 같아요.
편안하게 누워있으면 돼요~~ 릴렉스~
그다음엔~ 초코브라운+블랙을 섞어서 예쁜 색상으로
눈썹을 자연스럽게 그려주신답니다
엠보 눈썹! 자연눈썹으로~~그려주셔요.
이건 받자마자 ~~ 바로 찍은 사진인데요.
요즘 눈썹처럼~예쁘게 되었어요~
색상도 마음에 들고~ 엄마가 너무 만족하셨답니다.
기존에 눈썹은 너무 가늘었는데~ 적당한 두께와 너무 일자 눈썹도 아니게~~
예쁘게 나왔어요.
정말 자연스럽죠????
디자인이 너무 잘 나왔어요.
마지막에만 살짝? 아팠지만~ 거의 아프지 않았다고~
아플까 봐 걱정했었는데 괜찮았다고 하셨어요.
주의사항에 대해 자세히 알려주시고~
명함에도 자세히 나와있어서~ 집에 가서도 주의사항만 잘 지키면 될 것 같아요.
첫날엔 세수는 안 하는 게 좋고~
그 다음날부터는 간단하게 물세안만 해주면 된다고 해요.
각질이 탈각될 때 간지럽지만.. 긁지 말라는 주의사항도 한번 더 말씀해 주셨어요.
리터치는 3주 이후에 와서 받으라고 하시면서 재생크림과 함께~ 리터치 카드를 주셨어요~
저도 속눈썹 색상이 많이 빠졌는데... 엄마 리터치 하러 가실 때 예약 잡고 가야겠어요.
1:1 예약제라~ 원장님하고 상담 후 방문하면 된답니다.
수유 자연눈썹 잘하는곳 핑크브로우 적극 추천해요~

posts.title: Ravivihje: Toto5 Teivo 7.11.2017
posts.text:
Lähtölistat https://www.is.fi//www.is.fi/ravit/paivanravit | Tallikommentit https://www.is.fi//www.is.fi/ravit/tallikommentit | Pelaa https://www.is.fi//ravit.is.fi/fintoto Toto5-3 
Suosikki: 12 Elbert Schermer lähes tuplasi voittosummansa JTT-finaalivoitolla ja se tietää rivakkaa sarjojen nousua. Ei tiistain koitos kuitenkaan ainakaan Lahden lähtöä kovempi ole, joten ruuna on edelleen pelihevosia. Voltin vitonen tuo tosin alkuun laukkariskin, eikä hevonen ole muutenkaan aina täysin luotettava kaarrejuoksija kiertämään joutuessaan ja lapuille on syytä rastata nopean tahtiin muitakin kuin tämä tuore suurkilpailuvoittaja. 
Haastajat: 3 Johnny Flame on ottanut uudesta tallista kaksi komeaa kirivoittoa kolmesta yrittämästä ja suuntaus tuntuu olevan edelleen ylöspäin. Turussa ori pinkoi parijonosta peräti 11,5-vauhtia viimeiset 700 metriä ja sellainen kirivaihde tietää takahevosille tässä tukalia hetkiä. 
1 Lily's Star seurasi edellistä viimeksi kirissä, eikä ollut ainakaan kovin paljoa heikompi, vaikka maalissa väliin mahtui kaksi hevosta. Siihen nähden peliosuuksissa on aivan liian suuri ero sen ja Johnny Flamen välillä.. 
Yllättäjät: 10 Will Hans Beat on palannut tauolta vireessä. Ori olisi Jyväskylässä voinut vaikka voittaa, mikäli kirivaihe olisi sujunut suotuisammin ja terävä lopetus toi "vain" kolmosen. Ehdottoman kiinnostava pelihevonen miniprosenteilla. 11 Ali Baba Rajmar oli JTT-karsinnassa kipeä ja ori pystyy sitä paljon parempaan. Hyväkuntoisella 15 Västerbo Pursella riittää työsarkaa takamatkan suljetulta paikalta ja alustava peliosuus on liian korkea. 6 Basswood Grove on saanut viimeisissään nappijuoksut ja palkinnut ne hyvillä suorituksilla. Juoksurata on nyt kuitenkin kankealle avaajalle ennemmin miinus kuin plussa. Kovasukuinen ja kyvykäs 13 Rock On Roof suoritti viimeksi positiivisesti ja ruuna lähestyy huippukuntoa saadessaan pitkältä tauolta startteja. Tauluaan paljon kyvykkäämpi 16 Celebration Song oli viimeksi huomattavasti parempi kuin tauolta paluussaan, mutta näistä asemista on silti vaikea kiertää kaikkia. 7 Langen's Cza Cza seurasi edellistä viimeksi kirissä. Tämänkin tamman kunto on epäonnisten viime juoksujen sijoituksia parempi. 
Pelijakauma: Lily's Star ja Will Hans Beat ovat pelijakauman perusteella varsin kiinnostavia pelihevosia. 
Juoksunkulku: Lily's Star saanee pidettyä sisäradalta johtopaikan, josta sillä varmasti mielittäisiin myös ajettavan. Takahevosilla tuskin tehdään aikaisia ratkaisuja. IS-Pelisuositus - Toto5-3

(KUVA: Kaisa Rautaheimo ) Julkaistu: JÄÄKIEKKO Kiekko-Vantaan Toni Leinonen on sivussa aiheettomasti. Jääkiekon toiseksi korkeimmalla sarjatasolla Mestiksessä tapahtui erikoinen episodi. Kiekko-Vantaan pelaaja Toni Leinonen https://www.is.fi/haku/?query=toni+leinonen sai lauantaina pelatussa SaPKo-ottelussa ottelurangaistuksen potkaisemisesta. Mestiksen kurinpitäjä Pasi Järvinen https://www.is.fi/haku/?query=pasi+jarvinen on tutkinut Leinosen teon, ja hänen mielestään tilanteessa ei tapahtunut tuomittua rikettä. Silti Leinonen on pelikiellossa. Asia ilmenee Mestiksen verkkosivuilta http://www.mestis.fi/index.php/component/k2/item/2495-k-vantaan-leinoselle-yhden-ottelun-pelikielto.html . Syy Leinosen pelikieltoon johtuu säännöistä. Järvisen mukaan kurinpitäjä ei pysty ottelussa tuomittua ottelurangaistusta muuttamaan. Leinonen on pelikiellossa 15. marraskuuta pelattavassa LeKi–Kiekko-Vantaa -ottelussa.

Kerek kapcsan, felhoznam egy kicsit az orokzold temat :) D1-re akarok uj kiscipoket venni.
Arra gondoltam, hogy most pakolok fel ra egy BF Goodrich AT-t ko2-est, igy ugranek neki a telnek :) Korabban sokan irtatok errol jokat, hiszek nektek.
A kerdes termeszetesen a meret, most 205 80 r16 van rajta. A rugovalasztasnal viszont egybol lelkesen a gyari Bearmach-os HD rugokat raktam be ami hatul emelt rendese mert ugyebar megpakolt autora van tervezve, elol is kicsit de az nem volt annyira veszes. Meret kalkulator szerinte a 235 70 r16 es a 235 85 r16 kozott kb 6cm kulonseg van, ez 3cm vel magasabb a kerekivnel mint a gyari meret. Mindenhol a 2" emelest javasoljak ehhez a merethez, ami az en esetemben nem teljesul, viszont elol 2-3 cm megvan hatul meg nem kerdes :).
A rengeteg tudasommal, foleg jozan paraszti esszel siman beprobalnam a 235 85 R16-ot de azert megkerdeznelek Titeket is mielott meghirdetnem szinten itt a meretproblemas zsirujj akcios aru kerekeket :)
A terepjaro kepessegeinek toredeket foleg vadaszaton hasznalom, neha kis erdei utakkal.

thread.title: "자율주행자동차 vs 인간 이색 대결…판교 자율주행모터쇼"
thread.title_full: "자율주행자동차 vs 인간 이색 대결…판교 자율주행모터쇼"

posts.title: "자율주행자동차 vs 인간 이색 대결…판교 자율주행모터쇼"
posts.text: 글씨크기 작게 [오토모닝 정영창 기자] 경기도 성남시 판교제로시티에서 오는 16일부터 18일까지 개최되는 ‘2017 판교 자율주행모터쇼에서 자율주행자동차와 인간 사이의 이색 대결이 펼쳐진다. ‘자율주행자동차 vs 인간 미션 대결’은 속도 제한, 보행자 인식, 교통 신호 인식, 주차와 같은 다양한 주행 상황에서 자율주행자동차와 인간이 얼마나 정확하게 미션을 수행하였는지를 평가하는 것으로, 발전하고 있는 자율주행 기술을 더욱 가까이서 체험할 수 있는 시간으로 꾸며질 예정이다. 자율주행자동차와 참가자들은 주어진 교통상황 미션을 모두 완수해야 하며 출발부터 도착까지의 시간 및 미션 수행 정확도로 순위를 정한다. 판교 자율주행모터쇼 홈페이지를 통해 사전 참가 신청을 받으며, 이 중 10명을 선발해 자율주행차량과 대결하는 기회를 제공한다. 운전 경력에 따라 운전면허 취득 3년 이하 운전자(Beginner driver), 운전면허 취득 3년 이상 무사고 경력자(Best driver), 운수업 종사 경력 5년 이상 운전자(Expert driver), 운전면허 취득 5년 및 만 70세 이상 운전자(Senior driver), 한국자동차경주협회에 선수로 등록된 전문가(Pro driver)로 나누어 신청을 받으며, 각 부문 별 남녀 1명씩 선발된다. 참가자들과 이색 대결을 펼치게 될 자율주행자동차는 국제대학생 창작자동차 경진대회 자율주행부문에서 대상을 수상한 차량과 연구기관 및 기업연구용 차량 중 선정될 예정이다. ‘자율주행자동차 VS 인간 미션 대결’은 17일 오후 2시부터 약 세 시간 동안 야외 행사장에서 진행된다. 경기도와 서울대학교가 공동 주최하고 킨텍스, 차세대융합기술연구원이 공동주관하며 국토교통부, 과학기술정보통신부, 산업통상자원부 후원으로 개최되는 이번 행사는 자율주행 기술을 일반에 선보이는 자리이자 자율주행 시대를 직접 경험할 수 있는 체험의 장으로 꾸며질 예정이다. 16일 개막식에서는 자율주행자동차들이 싱크로나이즈드 드라이빙 퍼포먼스를 펼치며, 12월 시범 운행하는 자율주행 무인셔틀도 공개된다. 행사 3일간 오후 12시부터 2시까지 직접 자율주행차량을 탑승해 볼 수 있는 시승회도 진행한다. 이번 모터쇼가 열리는 판교제로시티는 자동차와 도시 환경이 정보통신기술(ICT)을 통해 정보를 주고받는 미래형 스마트시티로, 규제, 사고‧위험, 미아, 환경오염, 탄소배출이 없는 도시를 만들겠다는 의지를 반영해 ‘제로(ZERO)’라는 이름을 붙였다. 경기도는 이번 모터쇼를 통해 판교제로시티가 국내 자율주행자동차 산업의 허브로 자리매김할 수 있을 것으로 기대하고 있다. 이종돈 경기도 산업정책과장은 “자율주행자동차와 인간의 이색 대결은 모터쇼 참관객들이 보다 더 즐겁고 쉽게 자율주행을 경험할 수 있도록 마련됐다”며 “자동차계의 알파고 대결이라고도 할 수 있는 이색적이고 독특한 이벤트를 통해 자율주행차량과 기술에 대한 관심과 신뢰도를 높일 수 있을 것”이라고 전했다.

thread.title: Talks on pay disparity headed in positive direction: Sonakshi
thread.title_full: Talks on pay disparity headed in positive direction: Sonakshi

posts.author: The Pioneer
posts.title: Talks on pay disparity headed in positive direction: Sonakshi
posts.text: Talks on pay disparity headed in positive direction: Sonakshi Tuesday, 07 November 2017 | IANS | Mumbai Actress Sonakshi Sinha says the pay disparity in Bollywood is far from equalising, but the discussion on the issue is going in a positive direction. Sonakshi first spoke about pay disparity two years ago around the release of "Akira". Has the scenario changed since then? "Though it is far from equalising, the talk on pay disparity has gone (in) a positive direction. It is much better now. Pay disparity between men and women -- in any industry -- has existed for years; so it will not change overnight. It is a constant process. The good thing is the process has started," Sonakshi told IANS in an interview. "Being an actress, I am talking about the film industry, but it exists in other fields as well -- whether it is sports or business. All professionals put in equal effort, then why is there a gender bias in pay?" Sonakshi's latest release is crime thriller "Ittefaq", which also features Sidharth Malhotra and Akshaye Khanna. The film's team did not go out for the usual promotional activities as a marketing strategy. "It was a refreshing change for me to not promote the film before its release. At times, I think, at least for me, promoting the film is (more) challenging than performing in it. On the other hand, promotion and marketing are such a huge investment. This kind of no-promotion strategy saves money." According to Sonakshi, the audience decides to watch a film based on the trailer and not on other promotional activities. Asked how she decides to watch a film, Sonakshi said: "Star power does not work for me. If I like the trailer and the subject is interesting, I go for the film. I think even the audience judges (films) that way these days." Having started her career in 2010 with "Dabangg" opposite Salman Khan, Sonakshi has not only evolved as an actress but also changed her image from a quintessential Hindi film heroine to that of a progressive, contemporary Indian woman with films like "Akira", "Noor" and "Ittefaq". "Once we actors gain a certain reach and popularity in the beginning of our career, we can afford the experimentation. I think I am really fortunate that in just seven years, I have had a chance to work on such a variety of roles. "I am here in the film industry because of Salman Khan. I had no dream as a little girl to become a heroine... So whether it is an image change or having a set fan following, I think, starting my career with 'Dabangg' worked for me in many ways," she said. The actress is now busy shooting for her upcoming film "Happy Bhag Jayegi Returns". "I am so happy playing a Punjabi girl in the film. You know my father is a Bihari and my mother is a Sindhi, but I am Punjabi in my head... So, playing a Punjabi on screen is so much fun," quipped the daughter of actor-politician Shatrughan Sinha and actress Poonam Sinha.

thread.section_title: Выставки
thread.title: WorldSkills договорился о сотрудничестве с компаниями Р-Фарм и IEK.
thread.title_full: WorldSkills договорился о сотрудничестве с компаниями Р-Фарм и IEK. // Advis.ru

posts.author: advis.ru
posts.title: WorldSkills договорился о сотрудничестве с компаниями Р-Фарм и IEK.
posts.text:
Компании направят своих представителей на оценку результатов демонстрационного экзамена по стандартам WorldSkills и предоставят информацию о наличии вакансий
Союз "Молодые профессионалы" (WorldSkills) договорился о сотрудничестве с компаниями Р-Фарм и IEK в проведении мероприятий по популяризации демонстрационного экзамена по стандартам WorldSkills. Соглашение было подписано в рамках IV национального чемпионата сквозных рабочих профессий высокотехнологичных отраслей промышленности WorldSkills Hi-Tech, сообщили в субботу в пресс-службе Союза.
"Р-Фарм и IEK готовы направлять своих представителей на оценку результатов демонстрационного экзамена и предоставлять информацию Союзу о наличии вакансий. Также компании получат доступ к электронной базе данных, в которой содержится подробная информация о результатах сдачи выпускниками демонстрационного экзамена. Стороны также договорились об организации и проведении совместных мероприятий, направленных на популяризацию демонстрационного экзамена по стандартам WorldSkills", - говорится в сообщении.
По словам генерального директора Союза WorldSkills Роберта Уразова, демонстрационный экзамен по стандартам WorldSkills является практическим. "Логика какая: компания признает, что если студент колледжа, университета, частного центра сдает экзамен по стандарту WorldSkills, то они его принимают как инструмент оценки. То есть он им понятен, и они ему доверяют", - пояснил собеседник агентства.
В пресс-службе добавили, что пилотный проект по внедрению демонстрационного экзамена по стандартам WorldSkills Russia в систему государственной итоговой аттестации стартовал в январе 2017 года.
"На этом экзамене студенты выполняют задания, разработанные экспертным сообществом WorldSkills на основе конкурсных заданий чемпионатов международного движения по компетенциям, соответствующим образовательным программам среднего профессионального образования. С начала года свыше 14 тыс. студентов и выпускников профессиональных образовательных организаций сдали демонстрационный экзамен по 74 компетенциям. В пилотном проекте приняли участие 26 регионов России. На международной арене демонстрационный экзамен по стандартам WorldSkills уже признали Индия, Новая Зеландия, Белоруссия и Казахстан", - уточнили в пресс- службе.
О компаниях
Группа компаний "Р-Фарм" - российская высокотехнологичная фармацевтическая компания, основными направлениями деятельности являются производство готовых лекарственных форм, активных фармацевтических ингредиентов химической природы и биотехнологических субстанций, исследования и разработка инновационных препаратов и технологий, вывод на рынок современных лекарственных средств, а также обучение и подготовка специалистов для фарминдустрии и здравоохранения.
Группа компаний IEK - российский производитель и поставщик электротехнической продукции.
О WorldSkills Hi-Tech в Екатеринбурге
В этом году чемпионат проводится с 3 по 7 ноября по 27 компетенциям. Более 300 участников соревнуются в двух возрастных категориях - молодые рабочие от 19 до 28 лет и юниоры от 14 до 18 лет. Оценивать их результаты будут опытные российские и зарубежные эксперты.
Помимо соревнований запланирована и насыщенная деловая программа, состоящая из круглых столов, мастер-классов, проектных сессий и презентаций.
Чемпионат WorldSkills Hi-Tech является самым масштабным в России соревнованием профессионального мастерства среди крупнейших российских компаний, уже трижды он проходил в Екатеринбурге.
Информационное агентство России ТАСС выступает модератором деловой программы IV чемпионата WorldSkills Hi-Tech и организатором пленарного заседания.

thread.title: Sensex hits new record of 33,853.63; Nifty rises 34 pts
thread.title_full: Sensex hits new record of 33,853.63; Nifty rises 34 pts

posts.author: The Pioneer
posts.title: Sensex hits new record of 33,853.63; Nifty rises 34 pts
posts.text: Sensex hits new record of 33,853.63; Nifty rises 34 pts Tuesday, 07 November 2017 | PTI | Mumbai The benchmark BSE Sensex today scaled a new peak of 33,853.63 as its record setting spree continues for a third day on the back of rally in infrastructure, IT, capital goods and banking stocks. The broader Nifty gained 33.95 points, or 0.32 per cent, to trade at 10,485.75, approaching towards its life-time high of 10,490.45 points (intra-day) touched yesterday. Fresh inflows by foreign funds and positive global leads also lifted the mood, brokers said. Foreign portfolio investors (FPIs) bought shares worth a net Rs 576.27 crore yesterday, the provisional exchange data showed. The 30-share Sensex climbed 122.44 points, or 0.36 per cent, to scale a new high of 33,853.63, breaching its previous intra-day record of 33,848.42 hit yesterday. The gauge had gained 157.97 points in the previous two sessions and closed at record high of 33,731.19 yesterday. Except consumer durables, all the sectoral indices, led by infrastructure, IT, banking and realty were trading in the positive territory, with gains of up to 1.01 per cent. Brokers said investor sentiments remained upbeat on the back of better-than-expected Q2 earnings numbers posted by most of bluechip companies so far and a firming trend at other Asian markets. The US markets scored fresh records for a second day yesterday. Major gainers which supported the Sensex rally were ONGC, TCS, Sun Pharma, Infosys, M&M, Kotak Bank, Hindustan Unilever, HDFC Ltd, Cipla, Wipro, Hero MotoCorp, Lupin, HDFC Bank, SBI and NTPC. Globally, among other Asian markets, Hong Kong's Hang Seng was up 1.22 per cent while Japan's Nikkei rose 0.82 per cent in their late morning deals. Shanghai Composite Index gained 0.66 per cent. The US Dow Jones Industrial Average ended at record by gaining 0.04 per cent yesterday.

thread.title_full: ФОТО. Стильная четырехкомнатная "мансарда" в скандинавском стиле в сердце Риги

posts.title: ФОТО. Стильная четырехкомнатная "мансарда" в скандинавском стиле в сердце Риги
posts.text:
ФОТО. Стильная четырехкомнатная "мансарда" в скандинавском стиле в сердце Риги rus.DELFI.lv 1 комментарий Foto: Publicitātes foto Эта квартира типа "мансарда", если так можно назвать жилое помещение площадью 125 кв. метров и имеющее четыре комнаты. Находится она в доме на улице Театра — в сердце Старой Риги. 
Как нам рассказали специалисты Knowhow Realty, когда-то эта 175-метровая улочка называлась Яна тилта, но потом стала "Театральной", поскольку на нее из нынешнего здания Национальной оперы переселился 1-ый Рижский городской (немецкий) театр. 
Чего в этой квартире в избытке, так это солнца — спасибо многочисленным окнам, которые смотрят, кажется, прямо на небо, а вид из них открывается самый что ни на есть крышесносный. В смысле — на рижские крыши вокруг. Foto: Publicitātes foto 
Дизайн просторной квартиры выполнен в белых, серых и черных цветах. В тон подобрана и мебель, а все вместе — вкупе с отсутствием всего лишнего и обилием воздуха — образует так называемый скандинавский стиль. Удивительно, но выдержан он даже в ванной комнате! 
Вишенкой на торте является терраса с видами, которым позавидовал бы любой Карлсон. Впрочем, совсем не надо быть шведским летающим мужчиной в самом расцвете сил, чтобы оценить всю прелесть этой квартиры. Изучайте фото ниже — и судите сами! Source info
